city war phito along thro siege approvd valiant commander ant ch whole life esteemd honourd least discouragd death undaunted courage cryd thus sufferd would betray city dionysius however god would revenge tyrant short time admirable courage brave spirit man began work compassion dionysius soldier began murmur upon dionysius afraid lest phito rescud left tormenting orderd miserable man kindred thousand men wasted spoild territory caulonians time roman sent ambassador tyrrhenia gain intelligence expedition gaul meant came clusium saw army hetruria side drawn battalia ready engage valour else death pelopidas however pelopidas nothing movd said led inevitable destiny marchd forward came thessaly found alexander twenty thousand men possessd higer ground upon encampd face enemy almost indian chariot presently broken piece afterwards elephant made use mighty bulk body great strength bore trod underfoot ant ch many macedonian others catchd trunk tossd air fell great violence undertaking every one earnest learn give stop enemy eumenes hereupon commanded captain eumenes stratagem stop antigonus march soldier hand follow great number urn full fire chose highest ground country lookd every way towards wilderness markd several place within compass seventy furlong allo ted every captain post distant twenty cubit one another command kindle fire night every place first watch make greater fire still upon guard going supper refreshing second fire le third left near extinct distance might seem army certainly encampd together soldier observing order given inhabitant mountain friend pitho governor medium perceivd fire supposing army really encampd ran plain informd pitho antigonus amazd thunderstruck p strange unexpected news made halt consulted brought news course best taken men tyrd ant ch want every thing necessary engage enemy prepard furnishd plenty sort provision alledgd desperate hazardous adventure concluding therefore betrayd enemy force drawn together upon intelligence given designd resolvd march forward turn aside right army movd part country inhabited end soldier might refresh toilsom march mean time eumenes stratagem thus deluded enemy got army together part winterquarters fortifying camp rampire deep trench receivd confederate come plentifully furnishd camp thing necessary antigonus marchd desert receiving intelligence inhabitant rest eumenes force almost come elephant coming winterstations far slender guard sent two thousand horselanceliers two hundred tarentines lightarmd foot intercept setting upon without sufficient guard hopd might easily make master em deprive enemy main strength army eumenes fearing worst might happen upon account sent away guard five hundred best ant ch horse three thousand lightarmd foot soon
